CH_Intro_Animation_1_NC.content: Bad Dog Bart has stolen all the dog and cat toys in the neighborhood.
And there’s gonna be some really grumpy pets unless the toys are found!

CH_Intro_Animation_2_Daisy.content: Man-oh-man, that’s sounds terrible, Nature Cat!

CH_Intro_Animation_3_Squeeks.content: We might need some big-time help for this!

CH_Intro_Animation_4_Hal.content: Hey, I dunno, do ya think this treasure map I just dug up might help?

CH_Map_Intro_1_NC.content: Bad Dog Bart must’ve left behind a map that shows where his stolen treasure is buried
and three different ways to get there.

CH_Map_Intro_2_Daisy.content: Oooh! I wonder what we’ll see in Colossal Caves!

CH_Map_Intro_4_Hal.content: Critter Caverns sounds cool, cause I love critters and I love caverns!

CH_Map_Intro_5_Squeeks.content: Which one should we start with!?

CH_Map_Intro_6_Squeeks.content: Hey remember, when in a cave, we need to keep our voices down… Hal?

CH_Tunnel_All_Move_Right_And_Jump_NC.content: Move right and jump by tapping here!

CH_Challenge_Compass_Complete_Key_Pop_1_.content: Man-oh-man! You really know your compass directions!

CH_Challenge_Compass_Complete_Key_Pop_2_.content: We’ve finished my photo album and we’ve earned a key to Bad Dog Bart’s Treasure Vault.

CH_Challenge_Compass_Intro_Pop_1_Daisy.content: Hey, I really want to take pictures of my cave dwelling critter friends,
but I’m not exactly sure how to find them.

CH_Challenge_Compass_Intro_Pop_2_Hal.content: knowing the points on a compass is a super great way to figure out where you are and where you’re going.
Just follow these directions and you’ll be taking pictures in no time!

CH_Challenge_Compass_Intro_Pop_3_Hal.content: it’s telling you to go one block up.
it’s telling you to go one block down.
it’s telling you to go one block left.
it’s tells you to go one block right!

CH_Challenge_Compass_Intro_Pop_4_Hal.content: Unless you’re blocked by a wall. Easy, right?

CH_Challenge_Compass_Inactivity_Hal.content: Well, what’re we waiting for Cave Hunters? Let’s get hopping!

CH_Challenge_Compass_Item_Intro_1_Looks_.content: Looks like you need to find the

CH_Challenge_Compass_Item_Intro_2_Just_H.content: Just head in the direction that the compass indicates.

CH_Challenge_Compass_Item_Intro_After_Ta.content: Tap one of the lit squares to move to that position.

CH_Challenge_Compass_Wrong_Direction_Who.content: Look at the compass and try another direction.

CH_Challenge_Compass_Success_B_Hey_We_Fi.content: Hey, we figured this compass thing out.
Let’s find another critter for my photo album!

CH_Challenge_Compass_Success_C_We_Got_An.content: We got another great photo. Let’s do it again!

CH_Challenge_Duster_Success_After_A_Dais.content: Let’s try to find another one

CH_Challenge_Duster_Intro_Pop_1_Squeeks.content: Kinda looks like a paint brush!
And we can use it to brush away the dirt ever so slightly to uncover these really neat fossils.

CH_Challenge_Duster_Intro_Pop_2_Daisy.content: Okay, first we’ll show you a picture
and then you need to start brushing the wall
to uncover where the matching fossil is hidden.
There may be more than one fossil,
but only one that matches the fossil you’re looking for.

CH_Challenge_Duster_Complete_Key_Pop_Squ.content: Great job! You’re a natural Cave Hunter.
We’ve uncovered all the fossils and earned a key to Bad Dog Bart’s Treasure Vault.

CH_Challenge_Duster_Inactivity_Daisy.content: Hey, come on, fellow cave hunter!

CH_Challenge_Duster_Wrong_Daisy.content: Hey, have you tried looking over here?

CH_Challenge_Flashlight_Complete_Key_Pop.content: Great work! We found all the lost items
and earned a key to Bad Dog Bart’s Treasure Vault.
We found all the lost items
and earned a key to Bad Dog Bart’s Treasure Vault.

CH_Challenge_Flashlight_Inacvitity_A_Squ.content: Hey! What’re you waiting for Cave Hunters? We need your help!

CH_Challenge_Duster_Success_After_C_Dais.content: There’s no stopping you. Can you do it again?

CH_Challenge_Duster_The _Next_Fossil_You.content: The next fossil you need to find is

CH_Challenge_Flashlight_Intro_Pop_1_Hal.content: I love flashlights, because their so flashy and lighty
and all at the same time!
It looks like someone left all their equipment in the cave.
Let’s help them get’em back with our flashlight!

CH_Challenge_Flashlight_Intro_Pop_2_Sque.content: First we’ll show you a picture
and then you need to search the cave
with the flashlight to see if you can find it.
Find all the lost equipment to earn a golden treasure vault key!

CH_Fun_Fact_Cave_Salamander_A_Hal.content: Cave salamanders spend their lives in dark caves

CH_Fun_Fact_Cave_Salamander_B_Hal.content: Cave salamanders have very small eyes

CH_Fun_Fact_Cave_Salamander_C_Hal.content: Cave salamanders use their excellent ability to hear, smell and feel movement to survive.

CH_Fun_Fact_Cave_Wolf_Spider_A_NC.content: These Cave Wolf Spider has no eyes
It uses it's sharp sense of touch, taste and smell to find a meal.

CH_Fun_Fact_Cave_Crayfish_B_NC.content: Because a Southern Cave Crayfish is blind,
it uses its senses of touch and smell to find food and avoid trouble.

CH_Fun_Fact_Cave_Crayfish_C_NC.content: The Southern Cave Crayfish may live as long as 50 years!

CH_Fun_Fact_Cave_False_Scorpion_A_NC.content: False Scorpions are tiny scorpion lookalikes,
but they do not have the sharp sting of a real scorpion’s tail.

CH_Fun_Fact_Cave_False_Scorpion_B_NC.content: False Scorpions eat tiny bugs like mites and lice.

CH_Fun_Fact_Alabama_Cave_Shrimp_B_Daisy.content: Alabama cave shrimp spend their entire life in pools of water deep in the darkest parts of caves.

CH_Fun_Fact_Cave_Beetle_A_Squeeks.content: The Coleman cave beetle is only found in caves in side the sea.

CH_Fun_Fact_Cave_Beetle_B_Squeeks.content: The Coleman cave beetle has no eyes and eats other bugs, like spiders, mites and millipedes.

CH_Fun_Fact_Cave_Crayfish_A_NC.content: The Southern Cave Crayfish lives in the water systems of caves.

CH_Fun_Fact_Bone_Cave_Harvestman_A_Daisy.content: The bone cave harvestman is tiny with long legs and an orange-colored body.

CH_Fun_Fact_Bone_Cave_Harvestman_B_Daisy.content: The bone cave harvestman is often found under large rocks where it is damp.

CH_Fun_Fact_Ozark_Blind_Cavefish_A_Daisy.content: Ozark blind cavefish use their whisker like body parts to help them find food.

CH_Fun_Fact_Ozark_Blind_Cavefish_B_Daisy.content: Ozark blind cavefish can live as long as 15 years or more.

CH_Fun_Fact_Tumbling_Cave_Snail_A_Daisy.content: Tumbling Creek cave snails may hide under rocks in creeks inside caves.

CH_Fun_Fact_Tumbling_Cave_Snail_B_Daisy.content: Like some other cave animals, Tumbling Creek cave snails are also blind.

CH_Glow_Worm_Dance_1_NC.content: Oh no! There goes that really bad Bad Dog Bart.

CH_Glow_Worm_Dance_2_Daisy.content: But we got the toys back.

CH_Glow_Worm_Dance_3_Squeeks.content: And look at our glowworm dance party!
This makes me want to go back and collect more glow worms.

CH_Glow_Worm_Dance_4_Hal.content: These glow worms really can bust a move.
Makes me want to join them.

CH_Intro_Animation_Inactivity_A_NC_not_n.content: There’s an adventure to be had!

CH_Intro_Animation_Inactivity_B_NC_not_n.content: Let’s get this Cave Hunt started!

CH_Intro_Animation_Inactivity_C_NC_not_n.content: Those lost toys aren’t going to find themselves.

CH_Vault_Player_Earns_Key_Already_Earned.content: We already earned this key so we gotta find a different one in another tunnel.

CH_Vault_Player_Earns_Key_Still_Needs_Da.content: That vault door needs three special keys.
so just place it in the right place.

CH_Vault_Player_FInal_Key_In_Place_NC.content: Great work! All the special keys are in place.
Now all we need to do is turn the handle.

CH_Tunnel__ALL_Fail_Times_Up_NC.content: We gotta move a little faster if we want to get to that treasure vault in time.

CH_Tunnel__ALL_Success_1_NC.content: We made it through the tunnel in time.

CH_Tunnel__ALL_Success_2_NC.content: And check out all the glow worms we collected along the way!

CH_Tunnel_HF_Intro_Pop_1_NC.content: Hidden Falls has lots of underground streams and water falls.
Did you know many caves are formed by water?
But you know how I feel about water,
so let’s do everything we can to stay dry.

CH_Tunnel_HF_Intro_Pop_2_NC.content: Move left and right by tapping here

CH_Tunnel_HF_Start_1_Hal.content: We don’t have much time to find Bad Dog Bart’s hidden treasure vault at the end of this tunnel

CH_Tunnel_HF_Start_2_Hal.content: And don’t forget to collect as many glow worms as we can along the way for a special surprise
when we finally open the treasure vault.

CH_Tunnel_HF_Inactivity_A_Hal.content: It’s time to start hunting some caves!
Sniff sniff - I smell treasure ahead!

CH_Tunnel_HF_Inactivity_B_Hal.content: those toys will be lost forever!

CH_Tunnel_HF_Inactivity_C_Hal.content: Let’s get this cave huntin’ show on the road!

CH_Tunnel_CritterC_Start_1_Squeeks.content: We don’t have much time to find Bad Dog Bart’s hidden treasure vault at the end of this tunnel

CH_Tunnel_CritterC_Start_2_Squeeks.content: And don’t forget to collect as many glow worms as we can along the way for a special surprise when we finally open the treasure vault.

CH_Tunnel_HF_Fail_Collision_A_NC.content: I wish I had avoided that!

CH_Tunnel_CritterC_Intro_Pop_1_NC.content: Critter Cavern is filled with some of my favorite underground critter pals.
But be careful, we don’t want to disturb them

CH_Tunnel_CritterC_Intro_Pop_2_NC.content: Move left and right by tapping here

CH_Tunnel_ColossalC_Start_1_Daisy.content: You don’t have much time to find Bad Dog Bart’s hidden treasure vault at the end of this tunnel!

CH_Tunnel_ColossalC_Start_2_Daisy.content: And don’t forget to collect as many glow worms as you can for a sweet surprise when we finally enter the treasure vault.

CH_Tunnel_CritterC_Inactivity_A_Squeeks.content: Hey, you better get a move on!
Time’s a runnin’ out, my friend!

CH_Tunnel_CritterC_Inactivity_B_Squeeks.content: You gotta find that treasure vault!

CH_Tunnel_ColossalC_Intro_Pop_1_NC.content: Colossal Caves is amazing but be careful.
and the stalagmites on the ground  can break easily

CH_Tunnel_ColossalC_Fail_Collision_B_NC.content: I really gotta watch where I’m going.

CH_Tunnel_ColossalC_Inactivity_A_Daisy.content: Excuse me, did I forget to tell you that we need to find the Treasure vault?

CH_Tunnel_ColossalC_Inactivity_B_Daisy.content: Hurry! We need to find that treasure vault!

CH_Challenge_Flashlight_Success_C_1_Sque.content: Looks like you could cave hunt all day long.

CH_Challenge_Flashlight_Wrong_A_Squeeks_.content: Hey, have you tried looking over here?

CH_Challenge_Flashlight_Wrong_Area_Squee.content: Nothing over here, let’s look somewhere else.

CH_Fun_Fact_Alabama_Cave_Shrimp_A_Daisy.content: Alabama cave shrimp are about the size of a marble.

CH_Challenge_Flashlight_Success_A_2_Lets.content: Let’s try to find another one.

CH_Challenge_Flashlight_Success_B_Squeek.content: Oh yeah, man. You figured out this flashlight thing.

CH_Tunnel_ALL_Collecting_Glowworms_B_NC.content: How I love collecting glow worms!

CH_Tunnel_ColossalC_Fail_Collision_A_NC.content: Ouch!! That’s a lot harder than it looks.

CH_Challenge_Duster_Inactivity_Not_Dusti.content: Don't be affraid to pick me up so I can brush higher!

CH_Fun_Fact_Cave_Wolf_Spider_B_NC.content: This spider is only found in caves on the islands of Hawaii!

CH_Tunnel_CritterC_Inactivity_D_Squeeks.content: A little help please. I'm vertically challenged
